close_WashingMachine_door.description: Pull the open door of the WashingMachine towards you to shut it.

clean_opened_door.description: Wipe the open door of the WashingMachine to clean it.

close_washing_machine_door.description: The door of the washing machine is open. Please close it by swinging it inwards.

shut_washing_machine_door.description: Shut the opened door of the washing machine by rotating it along its hinge until it is in the closed position.

open_WashingMachine_door.description: Push the door of the WashingMachine to open it.

clean_closed_door.description: Wipe the closed door of the WashingMachine to clean it.

open_washing_machine_door.description: The door of the washing machine is closed. Please open it by swinging it outward.

do_nothing.description: The door of the washing machine is already closed. No action is needed.

unlock_washing_machine_door.description: Unlock the closed door of the washing machine by swinging it on its hinge until it is in the open position.

do_nothing_to_closed_door.description: The washing machine door is already closed.

close_washing_machine_door.description: The washing machine's door is already closed.

turn_on_WashingMachine.description: Press the button on the WashingMachine to turn it on.

turn_off_WashingMachine.description: Press the button on the WashingMachine to turn it off.

push_washing_machine_button.description: Press the button on the washing machine to turn it ON/OFF.

clean_button.description: Clean the button to ensure proper functioning.

activate_washing_machine.description: Activate the washing machine by pressing the main button.

clean_washing_machine_button.description: Clean the control button of the washing machine by wiping it with a cloth.

press_washing_machine_button.description: Press the button on the washing machine to start a wash cycle.

wipe_washing_machine_button.description: Wipe the button on the washing machine to clean it.

change_WashingMachine_setting.description: Rotate the WashingMachine knob to select your desired washing setting.

clean_WashingMachine_knob.description: Wipe the WashingMachine knob to clean it.

rotate_washing_machine_knob.description: Rotate the knob on the washing machine to change the settings.

clean_knob.description: Clean the knob to ensure clear marking and smooth rotation.

adjust_washing_machine_knob.description: Adjust the knob on the washing machine to select the required setting for a washing cycle.

clean_washing_machine_knob.description: Clean the knob of the washing machine by wiping it with a cloth.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob on the washing machine to select the desired setting.

wipe_knob.description: Wipe the knob on the washing machine to clean it.

clean_WashingMachine.description: Clean the entire WashingMachine including the body, door, knob, and button.

clean_body.description: Clean the washing machine body to remove dust and any other particles.

clean_washing_machine_surface.description: Clean the outer surface of the washing machine body by wiping it with a cloth.

wipe_washing_machine_body.description: Wipe the body of the washing machine to clean it.
